mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RNO, VNO, UNO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{vno}, #{uno}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno, r.vno, r.uno, r.title, r.content, r.regdate, r.updatedate, u.name AS userName, pr.phone_name AS phoneName FROM review r JOIN phoneadd p ON r.vno = p.vno JOIN phonepro pr ON p.cno = pr.cno JOIN users u ON r.uno = u.uno WHERE p.cno = #{cno} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC

SELECT r.rno, r.vno, r.uno, r.title, r.content, r.regdate, r.updatedate, u.name AS userName, p.phone_name AS phoneName, p.price, p.giga, p.color, p.manufacturer FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.uno = u.uno JOIN product p ON r.vno = p.cno ORDER BY r.regdate DESC
